typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		year as string,
		month as string,
		salesamount as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 pivot(groupBy(year),
	pivotBy(month),
	Totalsalesamount = sum(toInteger(salesamount)),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
Pivot1 keyGenerate(output(year as long),
	startAt: 100L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SurrogateKey1
source1 rank(asc(salesamount, true),
	output(year as long),
	dense: true) ~> Rank1
Rank1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	partitionFileNames:['pivotexample'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
